name: Doggy (Anawello)
description:
-- A short game about an old man´s memories--

Created by Anawello

It´s my second Game Jam, so i hope that you enjoy my game :D

I drew all sprites by hand and recorded most of audio clips with my phone

--Controls--

Use "A" "D" to move around, and click to lauch the ball or interact with objects

--Soundtrack--

Bach - Brandenburg Concerto No . 4, Presto
